topic_title:
Amazon EC2 Container Service
      TaskDefinition ContainerDefinitions VolumesFrom

variables.description: The name of the container that has the volumes to mount.
variables.name: SourceContainer

variables.description: Indicates whether the container can write to the volume. If you specify                      true, the container has read-only access to the volume.                   If you specify false, the container can write to the                   volume. By default, the value is false.
variables.name: ReadOnly
